snippet: Rodney McGruder hit a 3-pointer at the buzzer, and No. 13 Kansas State pulled out a 64-61 victory at Baylor after a failed inbound pass gave the Wildcats one more chance.
abstract: College Basketball Men's Roundup; Kansas State defeats Baylor, 64-61; other scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Rodney McGruder hit a 3-pointer at the buzzer, and No. 13 Kansas State pulled out a 64-61 victory at Baylor after a failed inbound pass gave the Wildcats one more chance.

headline.seo: Kansas State Hits Buzzer-Beater to Beat Baylor
headline.main: Baylor Tries Risky Move; Kansas State Makes It Pay
headline.print_headline: Baylor Tries Risky Move; Kansas State Makes It Pay
